text:
pUrvE &ri#ShTAH syAma taqnuvA# suqvIrA$H ||
mahyaM# ~Myajantuq mamaq yAni# haqvyA&&kU#tiH saqtyA mana#sO mE astu |
EnOq mAnigA$M kataqmaccaqnAhaM ~MviSvE# dEvAsOq adhi#vOca tA mE ||
dEvI$H ShaDurvIruqruNa#H kRuNOtaq viSvE# dEvA sa iqha vI#rayaddhvaM |
mAhA$smahi praqjayAq mA taqnUBiqrmA ra#dhAma dviShaqtE sO#ma rAjann ||
aqgnirmaqnyuM pra#tinuqdan puqrastAq- [  ] 30
